Game.Name: Barbie Superpack (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Barbie Superpack: Secret Agent / Groovy Games is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Digital Illusions and published by VU Games,which was released in 2005.Cheat: During Gameplay enter the following cheat to recieve unlimited health.
